introduction: Listen2.AI is an AI-powered app that presents unbiased, personalized news in short audio clips, so that you stay informed about the world without spending too much time.
features: Hands-free news - listen to it while multitasking
7 different categories of news to choose from
News from over 80,000 trusted sources and blogs
Political slider to choose news presentation
Option to listen in different languages
Check listening history and download scripts and audios
targetPeople: Busy individuals, multitaskers, people who prefer audio content, and those who want unbiased news

faqs.question: What is Listen2.AI?
faqs.answer: Listen2.AI is an AI-powered app that presents unbiased, personalized news in short audio clips.

faqs.question: Is Listen2.AI free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Listen2.AI is free to use.

faqs.question: Can I choose the type of news I want to listen to?
faqs.answer: Yes, Listen2.AI provides 7 different categories of news to choose from.

faqs.question: Does Listen2.AI have ads?
faqs.answer: No, Listen2.AI does not have ads.

faqs.question: Can I listen to news in different languages?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can choose the language you want to listen to the news in.

faqs.question: Can I revisit news stories I have listened to?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can check your listening history and download scripts and audios to re-listen to news stories.

faqs.question: Does Listen2.AI respect political ideologies?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can use the political slider to choose how the news should be presented based on your political orientation.
